thread.title: BRIEF-Aflac Inc Announces Two-For-One Stock Split In The Form Of A 100 Pct Stock Dividend Payable On March 16, 2018

title: BRIEF-Aflac Inc Announces Two-For-One Stock Split In The Form Of A 100 Pct Stock Dividend Payable On March 16, 2018
text: Market News February 13, 2018 / 9:25 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Aflac Inc Announces Two-For-One Stock Split In The Form Of A 100 Pct Stock Dividend Payable On March 16, 2018 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 13 (Reuters) - Aflac Inc: * AFLAC INCORPORATED ANNOUNCES TWO-FOR-ONE STOCK SPLIT IN THE FORM OF A 100% STOCK DIVIDEND PAYABLE ON MARCH 16, 2018 * AFLAC INC - ‍DECLARED A TWO-FOR-ONE STOCK SPLIT OF COMPANY‘S COMMON STOCK IN FORM OF A 100% STOCK DIVIDEND PAYABLE ON MARCH 16, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
